headline: VICI Properties Inc. Announces Release Date for First Quarter 2025 Results
summary: NEW YORK, March 31, 2025--VICI Properties Inc. (NYSE: VICI) ("VICI Properties" or the "Company") announced today that it will release its first quarter 2025 financial results on Wednesday, April 30, 2025 after the close of trading on the New York Stock Exchange. The Company will host a conference call and audio webcast on Thursday, May 1, 2025 at 10:00 a.m. Eastern Time (ET).
